Support Our Community

Your generous contributions help sustain our synagogue and support our community programs.

Donate Now

Membership

Join our synagogue family

Membership is broken down into two components, the first being regular operating membership- supporting the shul's costs to run programming. An additional component is a building membership, which is used to support the shul's efforts to establish and sustain a physical location to allow the shul to scale and grow. Note: Both components are being offered at reduced rates vs the shul costs in recognition of the need to support the growing community.

Membership Type Amount
Operating Membership
$800
Building Membership
$800
Total $1,600
